description: Gets a list of summaries for the entity recognizers that you have created.

nested_items.name: RecognizerName
nested_items.description: The name that you assigned the entity recognizer.

nested_items.name: NumberOfVersions
nested_items.description: The number of versions you created.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time that the latest entity recognizer version was submitted for processing.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionName
nested_items.description: The version name you assigned to the latest entity recognizer version.

nested_items.name: LatestVersionStatus
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the latest entity recognizer version.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Identifies the next page of results to return.
